meanings.sent1: The terminological discussion helped clarify the meaning of the terms.
meanings.sent2: The book contained many terminological explanations for the complex terms.
meanings.sent3: The terminological mix-up between the terms led to a humorous misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: Her terminological expertise in terms made her the go-to person for definitions.
meanings.sent5: The terminological details of the terms were etched in her memory.

meanings.definition: Involving the use of specialized terms or language.
meanings.sent1: The terminological document was filled with technical terms.
meanings.sent2: The terminological jargon used in the article was difficult to understand.
meanings.sent3: His terminological explanation of the specialized terms left everyone chuckling.
meanings.sent4: The terminological language created a barrier for those unfamiliar with the terms.
meanings.sent5: The terminological complexity of the terms required a deep understanding.
